name: Bound to the Sky
description:
This was a project made in a week for a GameJam by myself, acting as programmer and level designer, and Jack, acting as lead animator and texture designer. In the game you are a cloud who has fallen in love with a flower. However, you're bound to the sky and float upwards when objects are not directly above you. You complete 5 puzzles of increasing complexity, in your attempt to be reunited with your love.

Credits:

More of Jack's Work: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1rxu8CvYXhfgDGjrXaagbpBXukpI98xzn

Featuring royalty free music by:
